title: 2 Quickest Ways to Delete and Remove All Instagram Likes

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. You'll see this in the bottom right corner of your screen. If you aren't already logged into your Instagram account , enter your information to do so now. If you only want to remove a single like, navigate to the post, and then tap the heart icon. It should return to white (unfilled).

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This three-line menu icon is in the top-right corner of your screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Your activity.
steps.content: Tap Your activity . You can find this under the How you use Instagram header near the top.

steps.title: Tap Likes.
steps.content: Tap Likes . This is the first option under Interactions .

steps.title: Tap Select.
steps.content: Tap Select . You can find this in the top-right corner, above your listed posts.

steps.title: Tap the posts with likes you want to remove.
steps.content: Tap the posts with likes you want to remove. If you have a lot of posts to sort through, tap one of the filter buttons at the top. You can sort from oldest to newest, newest to oldest, by date, and by content type.

steps.title: Tap Unlike.
steps.content: Tap Unlike . This is at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Unlike again.
steps.content: Tap Unlike again. The selected posts will have your Like removed.

steps.title: Log into the Instagram website.
steps.content: Log into the Instagram website . You can use any desktop browser to log in to Instagram on your computer and remove all likes. If you don't know your password, you can easily reset it . If you only want to remove a single like, navigate to the post, and then click the heart icon. It should return to white (unfilled).

steps.title: Click ☰.
steps.content: Click ☰ . This is in the bottom-left corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click Your Activity.
steps.content: Click Your Activity . This is the second option, underneath Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Interactions.
steps.content: Click Interactions . You can find this under the Your activity header. You may already be on this tab.

steps.title: Click Likes.
steps.content: Click Likes . This is the first tab on the Interactions page. You'll find it next to Comments , Story Replies , and Reviews .

steps.title: Click Select.
steps.content: Click Select . You can find this in the top-right corner of your listed posts.

steps.title: Select the posts with likes you want to remove.
steps.content: Select the posts with likes you want to remove. If you have a lot of posts to sort through, you can click Sort & filter above your posts to sort from oldest to newest, newest to oldest, or from a certain start/end date.

steps.title: Click Unlike.
steps.content: Click Unlike . This is at the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Click Unlike again.
steps.content: Click Unlike again. The selected posts will have your Like removed.

steps.title: Is there any way to mass delete all likes on Instagram?
steps.content: Is there any way to mass delete all likes on Instagram? Yes, you can mass delete your likes on Instagram posts. To do so, tap the menu button on your profile and select Your activity > Interactions > Likes . Select the posts with likes you want to delete, and then tap Unlike .

steps.title: Is it possible to unlike all your Instagram likes?
steps.content: Is it possible to unlike all your Instagram likes? Yes, you can unlike all your Instagram likes, but it may take a while if you have a lot. While there's no way to automatically remove all your likes, you can select multiple posts at a time. This is much faster than manually removing likes one by one.

steps.title: How do I quickly unlike a post?
steps.content: How do I quickly unlike a post? If you accidentally liked a post, you can just tap the heart icon again to unlike it. The heart should go from red (filled) to white (unfilled). Keep in mind that users will still get notified that you liked their post.

steps.title: Will users be notified if I removed my likes?
steps.content: Will users be notified if I removed my likes? The post owner will not get a notification that you removed your like. However, they can still check if your username is in the list of likes on a post.

steps.title: Why can't I unlike posts on Instagram?
steps.content: Why can't I unlike posts on Instagram? If you can't unlike a post on Instagram, you may have a software bug or internet issue. If the red heart reappears after tapping it, you may have tried to unlike too many posts in a short amount of time. Restart the app and check your internet. If the issue persists, try again in 24 hours.

steps.title: Can I hide the like count?
steps.content: Can I hide the like count? You can only hide the like counts posts and Reels uploaded by other users. You can't hide the like count on your own posts. [2] X Research source To hide the like count on posts you see, click the menu button on your profile and select Settings . Tap Like and share counts below the What you see header. Toggle on Hide like and share count .
